app.name: txt-read
app.long_description:
Controls for the file viewer: Up and Down - move up or down one line 1 - Return to file select screen, staying in the directory (folder) you were in 2 - Return to file select screen, going back to root, and reasking argument question if required (see below) A - Toggle line numbers on or off Home - Quit the app back to whatever you used to load it
Controls for the file picker: Up and Down - move up or down one file Left and right - move up or down five files A - Load file or enter directory (note that while the ".." directory is implemented properly, the "." directory tends to do some random things.) Home - Quit the app back to whatever you used to load it
